views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 10
AdvancedStatusTime is a mobile substrate tweak that allows users to customize the time entry in the status bar. AST uses the native NSDateFormatter to convert date format strings into NSDates, allowing for more detailed time and date display. For example, if a user enters "M/d/y (E) | h:mm:ss a z" in the settings, the status bar time entry will display something similar to "5/23/2017 (Tue) | 8:23:17 PM CDT".

A date format cheat sheet is included in the settings of the tweak, and the tweak is DRM free.

Configure options from Settings.
